messages.title: My pledges to you:
messages.content: £10bn more for the NHS, Tackle the climate crisis, Look after pensioners, Scrap tuition fees, Build affordable homes

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Since 2010 the NHS has seen the largest real-terms cuts to funding in history. Labour founded the NHS. Only Labour will end its underfunding and creeping privatisation.
Labour will always be on the side of pensioners. TV licences will continue to be free for those who are over 75.
The sheer scale of the climate crisis demands radical transformation to create investment in renewable energy and a community energy revolution.

issues.environment: Tackle the climate crisis, Labour’s Green New Deal
issues.health: Health Care For All, Since 2010 the NHS has seen the largest real-terms cuts to funding in history., £10bn more for the NHS

leaflet.personalStatement: Labour stands for Change. I joined Labour to be a voice for those who are ignored. I joined Labour because the environment matters.

endorsements.endorsement: "I could never support the Liberal Democrats or agree to supporting a second referendum"

quotes.text: "I could never support the Liberal Democrats or agree to supporting a second referendum. Lisey has always been a strong Brexit supporter, but she is backing Labour this time.
